name: Beneath The Deep
description:
Beneath The Deep is a single-player sci-fi horror game created by a small team of indie developers. After waking up from a coma, you find yourself displaced in a rundown government facility. This facility was built in the abyss of the ocean to secure itself from the outside world. The game puzzles you with missions of problem-solving and exploration with the added danger of merciless and brutal creatures. Surviving has always been a critical element of human nature but only a few can put up to the challenge that this game has to offer. Beneath The Deep takes inspiration from various other well-known titles in the horror and sci-fi genres.

EXPLORE THE DEPTHS

Embark on an exploratory journey within the expansive and exhilarating facility, replete with numerous tiers and unanticipated challenges.


PLAY STRATEGICALLY

Engage in the art of crafting practical tools and equipment that will aid you in your journey through each challenging level. Avail yourself of the technological devices that are scattered throughout the facility to identify and track any potential adversaries that may be lurking in the shadows. Your gameplay approach will ultimately determine whether you are duly rewarded or met with consequences.


CRAFT STRATEGICALLY

When venturing into treacherous and perilous territories within the game, it's highly advisable to utilize your crafting skills to their fullest potential by meticulously forging an extensive repertoire of indispensable items that are specifically designed to bolster your chances of survival and grant you a significant advantage amidst the most challenging and precarious situations that may arise. Remember, strategic preparation through the creation of a diverse array of essential tools can be the key to triumph in the face of adversity.
